Spring Social 1.0.0 Milestone 5 (? ?, 2011)
==============================================
Miscellaneous
  - Upgraded to Jackson 2

Spring Social 1.0.0 Milestone 4 (June 7, 2011)
==============================================
 - Extracted Spring Social TripIt module from core Spring Social project.
 - Renamed TripItApi to TripIt.

Refer to Spring Social's changelog for a history of the TripIt module
prior to it being extracted into its own project.
